page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox layout object
page.description: Definition of a layout in the view box.

property.name: type
property.description: The type of layout. The layout can be "static", in which case HTML will be injected into the view box, of "template" (the default), in which case the contents of the view box will be derived from the passed in template.

property.name: html
property.description: If the type is "static", then the HTML to use in the view box. HTML can be a string, or a function that will return an HTML string.

property.name: template
property.description: If the type if "template", then the template to use to generate the HTML for the view box. See *[link:A5.u.template]*.

property.name: scroll
property.description: Override view box scroll settings for the layout.

property.name: axis
property.description: The axis to allow scrolling on. Values can be "x", "y" or "both".

property.name: items
property.description: Layout specific definition of named items to be used in the layout. See *[link:A5.ViewBox Item Object]*.
